name: cloudflare-python-workers
description: Build Python APIs on Cloudflare Workers using pywrangler CLI and WorkerEntrypoint class pattern. Includes Python Workflows for multi-step DAG automation with @step.do decorators. Use when: building Python serverless APIs, migrating Python code to edge, using Python ML libraries, or creating durable workflows. Prevents async errors, package compatibility issues, handler pattern mistakes. async def fetch(self, request): return Response(Hello from Python Worker!) name: my-python-worker, main: src/e
